<div class="col2"> <img src="images/abhishek_semi_casual.jpg" style="float:left;margin: 0px 25px 15px 0px;width:40%;">  I am a Consultant at the World Bank working as a Research Assistant with Dr. Vijayendra Rao, Dr. Siddharth George and Dr. M. R. Sharan working on projects related to decentralization in India.

I previously worked as a Research Assistant with Dr. Farzana Afridi and Dr. Kanika Mahajan on projects related to female labor force participation, marriage markets and access to cooking fuels in India.

I have a Master's in Economics from Delhi School of Economics and a Bachelor's degree in Management Studies from Shaheed Sukhdev College of Business Studies, Delhi University. 

My research interests focus on Political Economy and Development Economics. I am skilled in the use of R, Python and Stata for data analysis. My capabilities include Web-scraping, working with virtual machines on AWS/GCP/Azure, Statistical Analysis, Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing and Data Visualisation and Cleaning. My work routinely involves the use of recent developments in Artificial Intelligence.
